en.title: Ansible – Lesson 4: Inventory & Hosts File
en.subtitle: Understanding static inventory, groups, host patterns and variables

sections.heading: 1. What is Ansible Inventory?
sections.content: Inventory is a file that contains the list of target servers (managed nodes) that Ansible will manage.

sections.heading: 2. Default Inventory File Location
sections.content: The default inventory file is located at /etc/ansible/hosts.

sections.heading: 3. Static Inventory
sections.content: Static inventory is a simple text file where servers are manually added with IP addresses or hostnames.

sections.heading: 5. Inventory Groups
sections.content: Servers can be grouped like web, db, app to run tasks on specific server types.

sections.heading: 6. Running Commands on Groups
sections.content: You can run Ansible commands on group: ansible web -m ping

sections.heading: 7. Host Patterns
sections.content: Host patterns are used to target specific hosts or groups such as all, web, db, or combinations.

sections.heading: 8. Inventory with Ports & Users
sections.content: You can define custom SSH port and user in inventory like: 192.168.1.10 ansible_user=root ansible_port=22

sections.heading: 9. Inventory Variables
sections.content: Variables can be defined in inventory for each host or group to reuse values.

sections.heading: 10. Group Variables
sections.content: Group variables apply common variables to all hosts in a group.

sections.heading: 11. Test Inventory Connectivity
sections.content: Use command: ansible all -m ping to test connectivity.

sections.heading: Lesson 4 Summary
sections.content: You learned about inventory file, host groups, patterns and inventory variables.

ta.title: Ansible – பாடம் 4: Inventory & Hosts File
ta.subtitle: Static inventory, server groups, host patterns மற்றும் variables

sections.heading: 1. Ansible Inventory என்றால் என்ன?
sections.content: Ansible manage செய்யும் servers-ன் பட்டியலே inventory file ஆகும்.

sections.heading: 2. Default Inventory File Path
sections.content: Inventory file default path /etc/ansible/hosts.

sections.heading: 3. Static Inventory
sections.content: IP address அல்லது hostname கொண்டு manually servers add செய்வதே static inventory.

sections.heading: 5. Inventory Groups
sections.content: web, db, app போன்ற groups-ஆக servers-ஐ categorize செய்யலாம்.

sections.heading: 6. Group-ல் Command Run செய்வது
sections.content: ansible web -m ping என்ற command பயன்படுத்தலாம்.

sections.heading: 7. Host Patterns
sections.content: Specific host அல்லது group-ஐ target செய்ய host patterns பயன்படும்.

sections.heading: 8. Inventory-ல் User & Port
sections.content: Inventory-ல் custom SSH user மற்றும் port define செய்யலாம்.

sections.heading: 9. Inventory Variables
sections.content: Inventory-ல் variables define செய்து reuse செய்யலாம்.

sections.heading: 10. Group Variables
sections.content: ஒரே group-க்கு shared variables group variables ஆகும்.

sections.heading: 11. Inventory Test செய்வது
sections.content: ansible all -m ping command மூலம் test செய்யலாம்.

sections.heading: Lesson 4 Summary
